mapper.select: select s.vending_id, d.drink_id, d.drink_name,s.stock_quantity,d.drink_pic_id from drinks d inner join stocks s on d.drink_id=s.drink_id where s.vending_id = #{vendingId}

select vending_id, s.drink_id, d.drink_name, count(s.drink_id), count(case when s.customer_gender = '남' then 1 end) as countForMale, count(case when s.customer_gender = '여' then 1 end) as countForFemale, count(case when s.customer_age = 10 then 1 end) as countForTen, count(case when s.customer_age = 20 then 1 end) as countForTwenty, count(case when s.customer_age = 30 then 1 end) as countForThirty, count(case when s.customer_age = 40 then 1 end) as countForForthy, count(case when s.customer_age = 50 then 1 end) as countForFifty from sellinfo s inner join drinks d on s.drink_id = d.drink_id where vending_id = #{vendingId} group by 1,2 order by vending_id;

SELECT errorinfo.vending_id, asinfo.as_name,asinfo.as_id, asinfo.as_phone,'고장' as 'state' FROM asinfo,errorinfo WHERE (errorinfo.vending_id=errorinfo.vending_id and asinfo.as_id=errorinfo.as_id) union
SELECT stocks.vending_id, asinfo.as_name,asinfo.as_id, asinfo.as_phone, '재고 부족 ' as 'state' FROM ojt.stocks, asinfo WHERE stocks.stock_quantity<5 GROUP BY stocks.vending_id;
SELECT * FROM VENDING V, STOCKS S, DRINKS D, drinks_pic DP WHERE V.VENDING_ID = S.VENDING_ID AND S.DRINK_ID = D.DRINK_ID AND D.DRINK_PIC_ID = DP.pic_id AND V.VENDING_ID = #{vendingId}
